sentences.en: The old man lifted the wheelbarrow and trundled it away.
sentences.cn: 老人抬起手推车，慢慢地推走了。

sentences.en: I put on heavy shoes and rolled out my wheelbarrow.
sentences.cn: 我穿上笨重的鞋，推出了我的手推车。

sentences.en: Luckily a butcher soon came by, driving a pig in a wheelbarrow.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，一个屠夫很快就来了，用手推车推着一头猪。
